ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 211
ygData.msgSnippet: If anyone even thinks about sending this guy 250 real dollars for this stuff, then maybe you should be admitted. And the guy actually posting this post, you
ygData.messageBody:
If anyone even thinks about sending this guy 250 real dollars for
this stuff, then maybe you should be admitted. And the guy actually
posting this post, you must have rocks in your head to expect that
kind of money for some inanimate items in some game. Get real
pal, how about I just send you my paycheck every week, NOT.

Anyway, don't be stupid people and fall for scams like this, which is
all they are.

P.S. This is not a cheat, it is a scam and does not belong here. Maybe
you can't accept paypal cause you screwed too many people out of
their hard earned money and they kicked you off their service. Or could
be that it is almost impossible to get money back from someone if you
pay them by money order.

>________________________________________________________________________
>________________________________________________________________________
>
